content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day January 25, 2019 GDPR in 2019 Weve Only Just Begun January 25, 2019 E-mails, pop-ups, and opt-out messages flooded inboxes and browsers in 2018 as companies began to worry about consent governance and privacy regulation  and the business impact of non-compliance. The General Data Protection Act brought awareness and attention to data privacy across the world.
